Text: Ladies, does everyone have their drinks?

...Yes, it looks like we're all set! Lady Yukime,
please give a toast!
Right... Well then, ladies of Snow Fox Corporation.

Thanks to all of you, we've achieved incredible sales
with our new kimono line.

In appreciation for all your hard work, we've
organized this gathering—
*hic* C'mon, Lady Yukime! You're dragging on—!
Kana! You're already drunk?!

Huh? Eh, that's weird. Maybe I got drunk from the
smell of alcohol...

...It's worrying to see a woman of the red-light
district unable to handle her alcohol.
Ahahahah!

Anyway, let's all relax tonight. I want everyone to
enjoy themselves like Kana.

Now, a toast to the further prosperity of Snow Fox
Corporation... Cheers!
Cheers!
Sewing team, thank you for all your hard work.

Ah, Lady Yukime, thank you for today! The food is
delicious!

If you can't finish it all, feel free to wrap it up
and take it home to your family.

Why, thank you! I will be happy to take back any
leftovers.

No matter how good the design, you can't make
products without a sewing team.

It's thanks to your skilled craftsmanship that we can
produce fine kimono.

Well, that's awfully kind of you. We're grateful to
be employed here.

We're grateful to you for giving us work when we had
nowhere else to go.

I felt the same way when I worked in the red-light
district, wondering whether I'd be pouring alcohol
for the rest of my life...

But when you think about it in the context of a
lifetime, it's really just a fleeting moment...

Contemplating the future and creating a place to
work... I realized that's what really matters.

You truly have a good eye, Lady Yukime! You've been
like a savior to us! Our very own goddess!

Buttering me up won't get you anything extra.
I've already spent everything on this banquet.

You and your jests, Lady Yukime! Well then,
we'll have to make the most of it!

Heheh. Please do just that. I'll continue greeting
everyone—
Ahh, look who it is...
It's a shame to just be a wallflower.
Oh, Lady Yukime...
Are you enjoying yourself?
Y-Yes. I like to just observe everything...

(She reminds me of my younger self, when I felt so
alone in this world...)

Speaking of which, weren't you in charge of the
latest kimono design?

Y-Yes. I apologize. All I did was combine two popular
existing floral designs...
So you combined designs that you thought would sell.

(She could discern the customers' buying trends.
Instead of her own preferences, she looked to
provide what was in demand...)
You should hold up your head with pride.
Umm... Pride?

That's right. You based your designs on what people
wanted, correct?

What's evident to me...is that you considered the
preferences of the young women in this city.
Keep up the good work.
Th-Thank you so much!
(She really does remind me a bit of my younger self.)

(In the past, there were times I wanted to deny my
abilities, but looking back now, it's probably not
all bad.)
(Besides, she has her friends.)

Oh? Is that where you were hiding? Judging by the
look on your face, Lady Yukime has been praising you,
hasn't she!

I'm glad to see she's recognized your talent!
Now come and eat!
Wh-What?!

You're way too thin! You won't exude any allure like
that. Come on, eat up!
That's all meat... S-Someone, help!

Ahaha. You've been caught by quite the busybody.
I'm afraid you're on your own with that meal.

Who are you calling a busybody, Lady Yukime?
You'll be one too before long! Hahaha!
(This... Yes, this isn't all that bad.)
L-Lady Yukime! There's trouble!
Oh, you've already sobered up?

There's no time to be drunk! Black Tower forces are
headed this way!
The Black Tower... Would that be Juggernaut's boys?
Yes. Maybe they were drawn here by our banquet...

For crying out loud...this is a girls-only party.
Men aren't permitted.

We'll step out and attend to them so they won't
disrupt our celebration. Kana, prepare the alcohol.
Are you saying we're going to entertain them?

Customers are customers, even at times like this.
We'll quickly give them their fill and then ask them
to leave. Though, of course they'll have to pay a
special rate.

If you come with me, I'll have the strength of a
hundred women!
Hehe. Let's show them our hospitality!
